name: Bitochondria
description:
You are a very lucky unicellular that wanders through  a hostile environment. Your life relies on one breath of air!

  • Click mouse to skip text (game plays in the browser window above!)
  • WASD to move
  • Hold/Release Left Mouse button to dash
  • Click Right Mouse button to shoot
  • ESC to toggle Full Screen (Windows version)
  • Alt -  F4 to quit ( you are welcome :P)
